main.primary_sponsor: Department of Hematology, Xinqiao Hospital, Third Military Medical University
main.public_title: Clinical application of Umbilical Cord-Derived Mesenchymal Stem Cells in the Prophylaxis of Chronic Graft-versus-Host Disease after HLA-haploidentical stem cell transplantation-A Prospective, Randomized, Parallel-group Study
main.scientific_title: Efficacy and Safety of Umbilical Cord-Derived Mesenchymal Stem Cells in the Prophylaxis of Chronic Graft-versus-Host Disease after HLA-haploidentical stem cell transplantation
main.hc_freetext: Allogeneic hematopoietic stem cell transplantation patients with hematologic malignancies or non-hematologic malignancies
main.i_freetext: MSCs group :patients received 4 cycles umbilical cord-derived MSCs (1*10^7 per month) from 4 to 7 months after transplantation;normal saline group :Patients received 4 cycles normal saline(100ml per month) from 4 to 7 months after transplantation;

contact.affiliation: Department of Hematology, Xinqiao Hospital, Third Military Medical University

source_support.source_name: Strategic Priority Research Program of Chinese Academy of Sciences, Grant No. XDA01000000
